reviews.comments: Nos gustó la ubicación, la información sobre detalles del lugar, la disponibilidad permanente para comunicarnos con el titular del hospedaje
Gabriele es es un excelente anfitrión, y su departamento es perfecto
Muy lindo departamento con lindos amenities

Hemos tenido una estadía excelente! 
Recomendable 100%

La recepción de Gabriele, muy correcto y con actitud de estar siempre dispuesto a ayudarnos con lo
que necesitáramos! Nos recibió con bebidas, galletitas y café..., para asegurarse que teníamos algo al llegar! 
Nos explicó el funcionamiento de todo, y nos dejó una carpeta con la información en varios idiomas, recordándonos no solo el funcionamiento de la finca, sino, datos de la ciudad, direcciones de casas de cambio, restaurantes, radio taxi para llamar, que visitar y demás!

El piso muy guapo, limpio, cómodo y práctico. Con todo lo necesario para tener una buenas vacaciones! 

Si bien la finca cuenta con seguridad diurna y nocturna, el barrio es seguro.

Buena ubicación, en un barrio para disfrutar, tranquilo, pero con restaurantes, comercios y parques a solo unas calles y cerca de todos los medios de transporte para visitar la ciudad.

Felices de haber elegido este departamento ;) y a Gabriele como anfitrión!

excelente el recibimiento de  gabriele , muy atento y cordial en todo momento ,nos espero y se brindo para todo lo que necesitaramos . 
El departamento es hermoso tal cual lo muestra la publicacion. 
un lugar muy acogedor y en excelentes condiciones
Gabriele es un host increíble, nos quedamos un fin de semana y la atención fue de 5 estrellas. Todo limpio, con detalles y cálida bienvenida al llegar. Lo recomiendo al 100%!
Excelente apartamento con lo necesario. Cómodo y seguro. Gabriel y su esposa fueron nuy atentos.

Un lugar muy bien ubicado, limpio y el dueño muy amable y comunicativo.
Vale la pena por todos lados. Recomendable 100%.
Muy buena estancia en el departamento de Gabriele, y muy buen anfitrión.
Buenísimo, recomiendo a todos!

Muy Bueno

Departamento muy comodo y tal como sale en las fotos.
Muy acogedor, linda decoraciòn.Tiene todo lo necesario para una buena estadia. Espacioso y tiene un balconcito muy agradable y soleado. Bien ubicado, para  pasear en Palermo Soho. Gabriele nos recibiò muy amable, explicando todo, dejandonos informaciòn por escrito y algunos productos de alimentos que pudieramos necesitar. Excelente opciòn! Muy recomendable!!!!

El departamento es muy cómodo, moderno, está es una buena ubicación cerca a restaurantes, plazas y almacenes. Su anfitrión Gabriel es muy amable, atento y esta pendiente ante cualquier duda, nos recibió el primer día con comida, mapas y tips turísticos. Disfrutamos mucho muestra estadía allí .

El apartamento de Gabriele es tal y como se ve en las fotos. Esta limpio, con todo lo necesario. Camas confortables y lugar silencioso para poder dormir, incluso con la ventana abierta. Recomiendo totalmente este apartamento. El encuentro con Gabriele fue muy agradable y nos informó de todo lo que necesitamos saber. Repetiria sin duda.

Gabriele tiene un apartamento que tiene todo! Nos encanto la aria de Palermo y el apartamento esta en muy buena condicion. Gabriele es muy organizado y nos ayudo mucho siendo nuestra primera vez en Argentina. Volveria sin pensarlo dos veces!
Gabriele es un excelente anfitrión. Da información muy completa del apartamento y de la zona. El apartamento está en perfectas condiciones.

El departamento es perfecto para pasar unos días tranquilos en Buenos Aires. Tiene todo lo necesario. Lo que más nos gustó fue la ubicación, nos sentimos cerca de todo y lejos del tumulto al mismo tiempo. 
Gabriele es un gran anfitrión y estuvo muy pendiente antes, durante y después de nuestra estadía.  100% recomendable.

Gabriele fue muy amable con nosotras,mi hija y yo.
Nos esperaba con todo y más de lo que esperábamos. Nos entrego información de los lugares más turísticos y entretenidos para visitar.
Su apartamento es exactamente como indican las fotos..hermoso...impecable
La seguridad del edificio es muy buena.
Está a pocas cuadras de la estación del subte Palermo, tren, y colectivos,de modo que si no usas auto,movilizarte es muy fácil
Gabriele nos facilitó mucho nuestra (URL HIDDEN) un excelente anfitrión..mucho más de lo que esperábamos 
Nos sentimos cómodas y nada nos falto.
Cuando necesitamos de su ayuda nos la entrego rapidamente
Absolutamente recomendable

Todo se dió muy bien. El departamento de Gabriele és lindo, e el és um gran anfitrion, siempre atento, siempre dispuesto a colaborar y a dejarnos confortables. Amamos todo y ciertamente volveremos para desfrutar de todo. Sin duda, uno de los mejores sítios que nos quedamos. Gracias por todo, Gabriele.

El departamento está muy bien localizado, en area tranquila, segura y cerca de todo. Las facilidades encontradas dentro del departamento fueron excelentes. Apenas no tuvimos oportunidad de usar la piscina que solo es disponible en época de verano.

Excelente! Great!
Es exactamente como se ofrece: gran ubicación, departamento limpio, cómodo y seguro y gran anfitrión.
It's just as good as advertised: great location, clean, comfortable and safe apartment, and great host.

Tuvimos una excelente experiencia, Gabriele es muy hospitalario y amable. El vuelo llegó retrasado y nos estuvo esperando para hacer la entrega del apartamento, incluso nos compró algo de comida porque por la hora las tiendas estaban cerradas. El apartamento cuenta con todo lo que uno puede necesitar, está muy bien equipado. Nuestro único inconveniente fue el check out porque es a la 10 am y nuestro vuelo salía a la 7 pm y no hay donde dejar las maletas cerca. Pese a esto lo recomiendo totalmente, volvería a ir.

Gabriele estuvo muy atento el dia de nuestra llegada y nos proporciono toda la informacion que necesitamos para empezar a visitar buenos aires.

apartamento muy limpio y muy bien situado equipado. la localiyacion es muy buena. Muy recomendable.

un saludo y gracias por todo

Gabriele es un anfitrión excelente! Una bienvenida muy cordial y nos hizo sentirnos como en casa rápidamente! Sobre el apartamento... Perfecto! La localización es ideal, muy cerca del subte, muy buenos restaurantes en la zona y supermercados a menos de dos minutos. Simplemente nos encanto y ya tenemos claro que si volvemos a Buenos Aires volveríamos aquí! 100% recomendable!

El apartamento de Gabriele es moderno y cómodo. Nada nos faltó. Gabriele es muy organizado y tuvimos toda la información que requeríamos y más. Él es muy amable y accesible. No dudo en recomendar a quien desee quedarse en el apartamento. Gracias Gabriele.

El departamento está bien ubicado y en una zona muy segura cerca del metro, esta pequeño pero tiene todo lo necesario y las intalaciones están muy nuevas tal y como se ve en la fotgrafias, la verdad esta muy cómodo. Incluso nos recibió con algunos refrigerios por si veníamos cansados del viaje.

Muy lindo apartamento, perfecto para tres personas y las 4 noches que nos quedamos. La zona excelente con muchos negocios en la cercania y con locomocion a 3 cuadras.Gabriele un excelente anfitrion, volveriamos y lo recomendamos.

Fue una gran experiencia! La ubicación del apartamento estuvo excelente. Tenía muchísimos restaurantes cercas de la área Palermo. La parada del metro estaba a unas 4 cuadras, muy cerca.  El studio estaba perfecto, no se necesitaba más espacio para dos personas. Gabriele fue un excelente host detallando todo lo que necesitábamos saber el día que llegamos. Nos dejo su número de celular por cualquier cosa pero nunca tuvimos ningún problema. La área es segura y muy seguro el edificio ya que cuenta con un guardia todas las noches. Excelente lugar que quedarse en Buenos Aires!

El apartamento de Gabriele está ubicado en una buenísima y segura zona de Bs As. Trabajo, ocio, boliches y transporte, todo queda a la mano. El apartamento es chiquito pero funcional para 2 personas y cuenta con una terracita con lindas vistas a los edificios cercanos. Cero ruido para los que se desvelan con facilidad!
Muy recomendable

Es probablemente la mejor experiencia que hemos tenido en airbnb hasta ahora. Gabriele fue super puntual para todo, nos dio indicaciones de cómo llegar y salir precisas, el departamento era tal cual las fotos (ojo, es chico!), pero perfecto para una pareja o hasta 3 personas. Te acomodas sin problemas. El barrio es lindo, a un paso del metro, el jardin botanico y varios parques, y plaza serrano.. y un poco más allá, varias cuadras de outlets. Con el metro y los buses, llegas a todos lados y no es un viaje muy largo. Desde que llegamos, Gabriele fue super atento, y nos contestó los mails siempre y rápido, asi que todo fluyó muy rápido y fácil. Si vuelvo a BsAs, es probable que me quede nuevamente en este apartamento. Nos encantó!

Maravillosa fue nuestra estadía en el apartamento de Gabriele, bien ubicado, cómodo, completo y lindo; Gabriele es un excelente anfitrión, nos encantaría volver a Buenos Aires y no dudaríamos en rentar de nuevo su apartamento.

Excelente anfitrión, siempre dispuesto a prestar su ayuda, brindar información importante y facilitar la estadía.

El apto está muy bien ubicado, con vías de fácil acceso cercanas, supermercados, comercio en general, zona de restaurantes a pocas cuadras etc. Muy buena opción. 100% recomendable.

Tuve la oportunidad de estar durante una semana en Buenos Aires, el apartamento es muy bonito, limpio y muy cómodo, perfectas las instalaciones, además de que se encuentra en una zona súper nice y bien ubicada, cerca de avenidas principales, del subte, restaurantes y tiendas de autoservicio.

Adicional a eso cabe mencionar que el Sr. Gabriele Rojas es un excelente anfitrión, entregó el apartamento en tiempo y bajo los  términos establecidos, proporcionó información que fue de mucha ayuda durante la estadía y sobre todo siempre estuvo disponible para aclarar nuestras dudas.

Si visitan Bs As está es una excelente opción.
reviews.response:
Estimada Annie, muchas gracias, todo lo mejor y hasta siempre !
Cordiales saludos desde Buenos Aires !
Gabriele

reviews.comments: El departamento de Gabriele es fabuloso. Tuve una gran experiencia en Buenos Aires en este gran local. La zona es hermosa y está muy bien ubicado. Gabriele fue muy amable con migo y me dio buenos datos en que hacer en Bs As. Les recomendó quedar se acá en esta locación!
reviews.response:
Estimado Matías,
un gusto conocerte y gracias por la reserva.  todo lo mejor y cordiales saludos !!!
Gabriele

reviews.comments:
The apartment is stylish and fully equipped as you can see in the pictures, or even better! The building is new aswell, and you can enjoy a nice terrace where you can sunbathe or hang out. The swimming pool and gym are small but enjoyable aswell.

Gabriele is the best host ever! He'll answer your messages or calls instantly, and he is really helpful.

Neighbourhood is safe and a lot of fun!!
reviews.response:
Hola Ramiro,
fue un gran placer conocerte ! 
Muchas gracias por beneficiarme con la reserva y por todo.  
Para estas Fiestas y el Año Nuevo... sinceros deseos de felicidad y prosperidad !Todo lo mejor y hasta siempre ! 
Gabriele

reviews.comments: Place was great and had everything that we needed. Wonderful location and perfect for a single person or a couple.

Gabriele’s place is in the perfect spot of BA.  My wife and I were happy to call this place home as it was quite and safe.  Plenty of fun places to walk to and eat.  The apartment itself was very neat, and the amenities of the building were wonderful, as well.
Perfect and QUIET place in Palermo. Incredible host, will definitely stay again if we’re in Buenos Aires!

This is a lovely space with everything you could need in a great location with a relaxing rooftop pool and sun area. Gabriele provides just the right amount of information about the apartment and all amenities.  Communication was timely and helpful.  I have no hesitation in recommending this apartment.

We stayed in Gabriele's apartment for 4 nights and it was a fantastic base to explore Buenos Aires. Close to all the bars and restaurants in Palermo, the subway and easy access to the rest of the city. The apartment itself is bright and clean and we loved having both the balcony and the rooftop pool to use. Gabriele offered us some great tips and suggestions of where to find things locally and we'd definitely recommend staying there!

Loved this place ! 
As a woman traveling alone and visiting Argentina for the first time .... Palermo is a safe place ! 
The train and buses a few blocks away .. I had no problem walking at any time .. never felt unsafe :) 
I love walking ... if you do too you can manage getting around to many places and experience the real Buenos Aires ... 
Beautiful city ! I would love to come back and would stay here again ! 
Gabriele is amazing host ... I appreciate so much his patience explaining everything and recommendations..
Thanks Gabriele !
He was nice.
Fabulous host, great safe location.. Spotless and well fitted out .

Loved the location!! The rod drop pool and lounge area patio are awesome.. especially right after dark great views 
Would  gladly stay again.. Gabriele was awesome!
This is a perfect apartment for a stay in BA.  Gabriele was very accomodating.  The apartment was cleaned well and served our needs.  We would recommend!

Highly recommended. Gabriele welcomed us late at the apartment. he's very kind and thoughtful about his guests. Ideally located between Palermo Soho and Hollywood. Very calm, clean. Would recommend it to my friends and family!

Gabriele was an excelent host! The apartment was impecable, the neighbourhood is very nice and you can find everything you need within a few blocks from the apartment: coffee shops, supermarkets, grocery stores, famarcies, restaurants.. I surely recomend this place!

An excellent flat in a great location. Gabriele was very friendly at check in and communicated well throughout. The area is residential with quite a few bars, cafes and microbreweries sprinkled around.
Incredible host. Nice and accurate. Beautiful location. Great service. Priceless. What else?

Perfect for all!

The location was perfect and nice and cozy apartment.
You can get everything near Gabriele's apartment and Gabriele is SUPER HOST!
Enjoy Buenos Aieres, in Palermo!

Gabriele is a very friendly person, replies quite fast and gave us a super warm welcome to Buenos Aires with all info in hand, a welcome beer and even a subway ticket! Location is fantastic and the apartment is very nice and tidy

Gabriele is the most kindest and gracious host. Our flight was delayed and he waited patiently for us in the apartment for our arrival. His attention to our every detail was incredible! We will definitely consider staying at this apartment again. 

The apartment itself was in a great location. It was clean, comfortable and it had awesome facilities. Don't forget to view the stunning sunrises and sunsets from the rooftop. The apartments location on the other side of the building makes it quiet,  but you still enjoy the views and sounds of the city without interrupting your relaxation. The location is a short walk to everything you need, transport, restaurants, bars, supermarkets, tourist buses etc. 

Thank you Gabriele we loved meeting you and thanks for sharing your beautiful space with us. See you soon. Gina and Diego.

Amazing location close to public transport, shops and many bars and restaurants. Lovely apartment, perfect for two people wanting to explore the city. Communication from the host was outstanding, and we were very grateful he met us at 1am to collect the keys!

O apartamento é lindo, aconchegante, bem decorado, bem equipado, super novinho e limpo. Fica muito bem localizado, perto de ótimos restaurantes, mercados, cafés e lojas. O prédio é muito bom e seguro, com zelador 24h. Além de tudo o Gabriele é muito simpático, se preocupou com todos os detalhes e nos ajudou em tudo que precisamos. Voltarei a BsAs e com certeza me hospedarei nesse apartamento novamente. Me senti em casa!

Gabriele was so helpful, both before and during my stay in his flat. He met us in the building and was a fountain of knowledge about Buenos Aires. 
The flat itself is well located, in the trendy neighbourhood of Palermo, only a ten minute walk from the area with lots of bars and delicious restaurants - close enough to be convenient but far enough to not hear people out til the early hours. The flat is also less than 10 minutes' walk from Palermo Subte (metro) station, which is so convenient for sightseeing in the city centre.
The flat itself is small but the use of space is really excellent; it was clean, well equipped and safe (it's on the 8th floor, and there is a security guard at the door). Please note that there is a microwave oven, but not a proper oven, and that the jacuzzi is only available in the summer. 
Definitely would recommend this place to anyone!

Apartamento excelente, bonito, limpo em ótima localização em Buenos Aires. Gabriele é um host excelente, sempre muito solicito. O único pequeno problema é o chuveiro, que não tem box fechado, então toda vez que tomávamos banho molhava muito o piso. Mesmo assim, recomendo muito a estadia!

O Gabriele é um anfitrião extremamente gentil e disponível e seu apartamento é preparado nos mínimos detalhes para receber pessoas de fora que estão visitando Buenos Aires. Nossa estadia foi maravilhosa... Cama confortável, televisão ótima, segurança, utilidades de cozinha que facilitam a vida, banho quentinho, secador de cabelo, caderninho com dicas da cidade e da região do apê para quem não conhece o local... tudo perfeito! Muito obrigada, Gabriele, por essa estadia... quando voltar a BsAs vou tentar ficar no mesmo lugar novamente!

Ps. Ah! Fica a 2 quarteirões do metrô! É tem vários barzinhos super legais perto. Eu recomendo o El Têxtil, que fica a menos de 1 quarteirão ,)

We loved the well equiped studio apartment close to restaurants & supermarkets but in a quiet location away from the busy city. The Hop on Hop off bus stops are located close by & is a great way to see the city & surrounds. Gabriele the host is very helpful & forth coming with information to make your stay easy.
Espaço maravilhoso, ideal para casais, próximo à trasporte público, bares e restaurantes. Muito bem localizado. Anfitrião perfeito, vale a pena.

O apartamento de Gabriele é um encanto. Limpo, organizado, confortável e acolhedor, é próximo de excelentes restaurantes, bares, pontos de ônibus e tudo o mais que um turista necessita ao visitar Buenos Aires. Gabriele é muito organizado e pontual. Nos orientou e foi disponível para o que precisássemos. Recomendamos fortemente e, se um dia voltarmos, tentaremos ficar com ele novamente. Eduardo e Mônica

Excelente localização, dá pra passear a pé, ótimos restaurantes, cafeterias, lojas, shopping, mercado tudo perto. Muito seguro, apartamento bem decorado e super equipado. O anfitrião muito hospitaleiro e educado. Mercado na mesma quadra. Localizado no melhor bairro para turistas, cheio de opções para lazer. Adoramos e com certeza nos hospedariamos novamente.

Went to BsAs for 2 weeks and I loved this place. Ok it was not downtown but the location was great. It was 5 min to major bus route and subway. Never used uber or a taxi. Always public transportation. It is a small apartment but was what I saw and what I needed. The communication was good. I understood my host even if I didn't speak a world of spanish. I would recommend this place and like I, I am sure you will have a good time

Perfect apartment for central Palermo area with good access to public transport and awesome bars/restaurants. The apartment itself is well equipped with great ammneties. If you get a chance to make use of the pool is great. This is definitely a perfect pick for BA city stay and would definitely stay here again. 
Thanks Gabriele for being so helpful and welcoming.

We stayed in Gabriele’s studio apartment in Palermo for five nights. It was perfect for what we needed. The apartment was very clean; everything was spotless! The kitchen has everything you need to cook meals in, and the bedroom and outside balcony are nicely divided, with an amazing view of the neighborhood. Security for the building is excellent, there is a guard on the door in the evenings and key fobs to enter. The location is very good: a ten minute walk to the metro, short walk to most supermarkets and within easy distance of all of the great bars and restaurants of Palermo Soho. Gabriele was a wonderful, welcoming host: excellent communication before, during and after check-in, and always on hand to answer any questions. We'd definitely recommend and would stay again.
In the middle of a safe area and still very walkable to ALL things.
Great location in the middle of Palermo soho. Easy to get to other parts of town too.
Super appartement, bien situé, petite terrasse au soleil le matin pour profiter du petit déjeuner...super piscine sur le toit, très agréable quand il fait chaud à Buenos Aires !

Gabriele's apartment is well located within the hip neighborhood of Palermo Soho. It's very close distance to many wonderful restaurants, bars and shops. It's also very easy to get to the D Line of Buenos Aires' subway system to get to other parts of the city. Gabriele was responsive and easy to work with... would definitely recommend!

Merci Gabriel pour cet excellent séjour, l'appartement était parfait, très moderne, très bien agencé, très joli, avec un petit balcon et surtout des commodités très sympa dans l'immeuble (piscine, jacuzzi sur le toit).

L'accueil a été parfait et très amical, beaucoup de conseils donnés et de bon plan, merci encore Gabriel ! 

L'appartement est très bien placé dans un quartier très sympa, avec bars/restos, magasins...pas dans le quartier du centre historique mais dans un quartier proche très tendance, vivant et tranquille, toutes les commodités accessibles à pieds.

Un très belle adresse à recommander !

Excellent apartment in a nice, trendy neighbourhood. Lots of shops, restaurants and bars witin a walking distance. Pool and terrace on the top floor!

Gabriele is so nice and helpful and will answer all your questions eagerly. :)

The place is amazing!
Good location if is your first visit in Buenos Aires.
Gabriele was friendly and gave me all the information about the stores and services around his apartment.
vielen lieben danke für den warmen empfang und der wunderbare aufenthalt in buenos aires! wir können die unterkunft nur empfehlen!
We had an excellent time, Gabriele was very nice and supporting !

Gabriele was a great host! No problems at all with check-in. He was there to greet us and show us the apartment. He also gave us a rundown on the area and where all the good stuff is. Place is in a perfect and safe location close to many great bars and restaurants. Apartment was exactly like the pictures. And the rooftop pool/terrace is amazing at sunset!

The host is very gentle, polite and carefull. The apartment is amazing, very well located, equiped and confortable. The building is very new, with a nice pool and 24 hours security. The location is perfect for those who wants to feel the best of Buenos Aires. For sure when we go back to Buenos Aires we will choose to stay there.
Excelente apartamento com excelente localização!

Gabriele gave a warm welcome to Buenos Aires. He reviewed all the details of the apartment and the neighbourhood - I don't speak much Spanish, and he doesn't speak much English - but we managed to communicate just fine! The apartment is clean, quiet and very comfortable. Neighbourhood is great - a short walk to the action in Palermo and to the Subway. Highly recommend!

Gabriele's studio apartment is in a nice quiet location in soho that is only a few short blocks to lots of nice restaurants, bars and an emerging craft beer culture! The metro access to downtown was easy and direct. 

The studio apartment itself has all the necessary amenity for a great stay in Buenos Aires. The rooftop entertaining Area and pool was also of great use after hot BA days. 

While we only spoke a little common language (my Spanish and Italian aren't great!) Gabriele was helpful and easy to communicate with. My wife and I had a great time and would stay again.

O apartamento é ótimo! Muito bem localizado e estava limpíssimo quando chegamos. 
Apesar de pequeno, é perfeito para acomodar um casal.

Gabriele foi super atencioso e solicito em todos os momentos que precisamos dele =D

Gabriele was a wonderful host! The apartment was clean, well-stocked, and in an ideal location. We loved having several great dining options close as well as being able to get to public transportation easily. The apartment is in a quiet building with overnight and weekend security, so we felt absolutely comfortable. The bed is comfortable, and the apartment is outfitted with everyone you need: pots and pans, a small fridge and stove, and other kitchen items so you can cook or heat up leftovers; the TV has cable; and the apartment has wi-fi. We spent very little time in the apartment because we were exploring the city, but should one wish to stay in, everything is at the tips of your fingers. 

One thing that is completely out of Gabriele's control, but worth noting: the neighbors next door smoke quite a lot, so the hallway outside the apartment frequently smelled like cigarettes.

Es war eine tolle Unterkunft.  Sehr zentral, sauber und gut ausgestattet.
Palermo ist ein toller Stadtteil.
Gabriele ist ein sehr netter Gastgeber. Da wir sehr zeitig in BA gelandet sind, war er sehr entgegenkommend bei der Check in Zeit.
Leider ist das ganze Haus sehr hellhörig, also Ohrstöpsel mitnehmen, wenn man die Nachbarn nicht belauschen möchte.
Das Bett ist für "Mitteleuropäer" etwas kurz (ca.1,80m).
Super, Gabriele spricht perfekt deutsch !!!!
reviews.response:
Liebe Frau Birgit, vielen Dank für Ihre Beurteilung !  
Sie haben wirklich in einer sehr zentralen und geliebten Wohnviertel gewohnt ! 
In Bezug auf das Doppelbett, wünsche ich eine information hinzuzufügen : Dies ist das Model Queen Boxspringbett.  Der einzigartige Aufbau von Boxspringbetten sorgt für einen erholsamen Schlaf und das typische Design.  Die Federkernmatratze stützt deinen Körper punktelastisch, während der gefederte Unterbau den Druck flächenelastisch verteilt.  So entsteht bei Boxspringbetten ein fast schwebendes Liegegefühl.  Dein Körper wird optimal gestützt, Wirbelsäule, Gelenke und Muskulatur entspannen optimal – für einen tiefen und erholsamen Schlaf.  Mit Boxspringbetten geht man nicht einfach nur schlafen – sie sind in dieser hektischen Zeit gleichzeitig ein Zufluchtsort, der Erholung und Wohlbefinden schenkt.  Mit ihren gepolsterten Kopfteilen machen sie das Lesen und Fernsehen im Bett himmlisch bequem.  Der hohe Aufbau stellt den bequemen Ein- und Ausstieg ins Bett sicher.
Produktmaße: Länge: 200 cm,  Breite: 160 cm,  Separate Boxspring-Kopfteil  Höhe: 140 cm,  Tiefe: 10 cm
Matratzenlänge: 190 cm,  Matratzenbreite: 160 cm
Schöne Grüße aus Buenos Aires!

reviews.comments:
Gabriele's place is absolutely perfect! Gabriele is the perfect host and he attends to every detail down to umbrellas. The apartment is compact but feels spacious and very cheerful.
The location is absolutely the best in Buenos Aires; a coffee shop and a supermarket (open until 11:00pm) on the same block, lots of restaurants, bars, cafes, clubs, and boutiques within a few blocks, a shopping center (Argos Outlet Mall) a block away, and the Palermo subway station within a couple of blocks.
The building is modern and very well kept with 24-hour security.  The rooftop pool and jacuzzi would be a great welcome home amenity in warm weather.
Above all, Gabriele was the perfect host; thoughtful and accommodating, gracious and inviting.
I have very food memories of Buenos Aires and much of the good times I had were due to staying at Gabriele's Gold Soho!
Buona Onda!

Só temos elogios ao apartamento e, principalmente, à Gabriele. Excelente anfitrião e grande pessoa, percebido logo nos primeiros minutos de conversa. Sobre o apartamento e a localização, não pode ser melhor a estadia em Buenos Aires. Um monoambiente completo, limpo, organizado, bem dividido e completo em utensílios e equipamentos, além de estar inserido ao lado do Districto Arcos e vários bares, restaurantes e locais para diversão. O que dizer do telefone disponível para os hóspedes  para ligações locais sem custo adicional, que não seja, "sensacional"?! Minha família esteve em casa nessas 5 noites e devemos ao Gabriele e seu espaço!!
Muito obrigado e nos espere novamente em breve!!

Ficamos 3 dias em Buenos Aires.  Apartamento do Gabriele é muito bem localizado em Palermo, próximo ao metrô e perto de bons bares e restaurantes.  Gostamos muito do apartamento,  muito bem equipado e confortável. 
O Gabriele é um ótimo anfitrião, muito simpático e nos deixou muito à vontade. 
Recomendamos esse apartamento lindo e moderno.

Tivemos uma ótima estadia no apartamento! Condiz realmente com as fotos e tem tudo o que você precisará para se hospedar (cofre, cabides, espelho, um secador, calefação no banheiro, varanda com mesinha, telefone fixo). A comunicação com o proprietário foi bem fácil e rápida. Ele nos recebeu no apartamento e nos explicou tudo. Foi muito cordial e simpático. Ele também nos deixou alguns sucos e biscoitos. Deixou também uma pasta com dicas de locais (sugestões de restaurantes e outras coisas, com os devidos telefones e endereços), instruções dos itens do apartamento e regras do prédio. O prédio tem um bom sistema de segurança e é tranquilo. A vizinhança também é bem legal (Palermo tem muitos restaurantes e barzinhos, incluindo bons restaurantes de parrilla, em que fomos à pé tranquilamente). Tem um Carrefour Express quase do lado, bem como quiosques e lojas de conveniência. E, se você estiver predisposto a andar um pouco, dá para ir à pé também para as praças (como a Plaza Itália), bosques (como o rosedal) e, um pouco mais distante, à Floralis Genérica e ao Zoo. Nestes três últimos pontos que citei, passa a linha do ônibus de turismo (tanto o circuito amarelo quanto o azul). Quanto ao transporte público, há estações de metrô próximas (como a da Plaza Itália e a de Palermo, em que precisam do cartão do Sube e custam algo em torno de cinco pesos, mas não recordo com certeza) e muitos pontos de ônibus (mas não utilizamos). O apartamento é espaçoso, com boas divisórias de ambientes e com a possibilidade de poder controlar a intensidade da luz. Bem decorado e  condiz com as fotos. Voltaria com certeza.

Esta foi a minha primeira experiência no Airbnb e não poderia ter sido melhor.
O apartamento é exatamente como está nas fotos e descrição. Confortável e acolhedor.
Gabrielle foi muito atencioso desde o primeiro momento, nos ajudando com tudo o que foi possível.

Adorei o apartamento de Gabrielle. Ele, muito educado, nos recebeu muito bem dando todas as orientações necessárias. Passei 4 dias maravilhosos em Buenos Aires. O apartamento é muito limpo, bem cuidado e bem localizado, perto de bares, restaurantes, ônibus e metrô. Exatamente igual às fotos da internet. Quando eu for a Buenos aires novamente, sem dúvida ficarei lá de novo. 
Suzana

Sò tenho a agradecer a pontualidade e gentileza do Gabriele, o apartamento muito confortável e bem equipado. Foi muito paciente em ouvir e entender as duas brasileiras encantada com Buenos Aires. 
Deixou apenas um gostinho de quero mais..Gracias
O Gabriele foi um ótimo anfitrião! Gostamos muito, o lugar era muito limpo e (URL HIDDEN) certeza voltaremos!
Apartamento muito bem localizado e bem conservado. Nossa estada foi muito gratificante.

Gabriele was really lovely, and the apartment was just incredible! In fact, certain aspects of it made me feel like I was in an upscale hotel! It is perfectly situated in the centre of Soho Palermo, a stone's throw from some great restaurants and bars. It is a quiet and very safe area. 

Gabriele was at the apartment to greet me and show me around when I arrived. The security men downstairs were also on-hand for anything I needed, and were really friendly. 

I would 100% recommend this apartment to anyone wishing to stay in Buenos Aires, and I would definitely book it again for myself. It is spacious, incredibly comfortable, modern, well-furnished, and Gabriele kindly left me water, juice, beer etc.

Thanks, Gabriele!! :)

The apartment was exactly as described in the listing and had everything required for a great stay in BA. Gabriele was an excellent host, and we were able to communicate using his patient Spanish. The apartment is in a perfect location, close to transport and activities, but not in a noisy street. There are some great little restaurants and bars in the neighbouring blocks, plus the main Palermo entertainment areas are about 15 minutes walk away. We did not feel at all unsafe on the streets at night. Inside, the apartment was very clean, secure and had everything that you needed, with the bonus of the funky decor. It is ideal for two people and we would not hesitate to book it again.
It was great experience to stay in this cozy apartment. Host is very nice and the neighbourhood is safe. Many nice restaurants and fashion stores around here, you will definitely enjoy the life here.

Gabriele é o melhor anfitrião que alguém poderia ter. 
Desde o primeiro foi super atencioso, nos fornecendo dicas sobre a cidade e sobre o bairro onde fica o apartamento. Também nos forneceu orientação acerca da melhor forma de chegar ao apto desde os dois aeroportos da cidade. 
As fotos reproduzem fidedignamente o apto. O apartamento é bastante aconchegante e percebi que tudo foi muito bem pensado p/ fazer o viajante se sentir em casa. Nos sentimos super confortáveis. A cozinha está completamente equipada. As camas são bastante confortáveis. A limpeza do apto é invejável. Gabriele ainda nos presenteou com os seguintes itens: água, biscoitos, refrigerante, suco e cerveja. Nunca fui tão bem recebido por um anfitrião do Airbnb. 
Ele nos disponibilizou uma cartilha com dicas de restaurantes e do que fazer no bairro de Palermo. Na cartilha tb havia telefones úteis (por exemplo, de um táxi 24h).
A localização do apartamento é perfeita. No charmoso bairro de Palermo. Encontramos os melhores restaurantes, cafés e baladas por lá. Fazíamos tudo a pé, até pq é uma delícia caminhar pelo bairro de Palermo. Portanto, só tenho elogios a fazer. 
E precisa deixar aqui externado meu muito obrigado a Gabriele.

Gabrielle is a very good host who welcomes you in the best possible way and provides you with all the information you need. The apartment is very modern and has all utilities and equipment one could need. It is very cozy.

The place is very nice and exactly according the pictures. it's very good located in a nice neighborhood and in walking distance to good restaurants and cool bars.
The communication and information (in advance only in spanish, at the place some good information written in different languages) was very friendly and quick. Also the welcome was very nice and uncomplicated. We didn't use pool or gym but it looked small but nice
All together a perfect place to discover the city.

The apartment was very well located and had everything you needed for a perfect city trip to Buenos Aires. We were welcomed in a very friendly way by Gabriele who explained everything on the apartment and the neighbourhood. We enjoyed our stay and can recommend this apartment to everyone. It is clean, modern, safe and the owner is very helpfull in case you have any questions. We had a blast.

Gabriele is a fantastic host, very attentive and helpful. He thought about everything in the apartment and even provided some drinks upon arrival. The apartment is great, just as on the pictures and the rooftop area with the pool is amazing. The location of the apartment is very convenient in a hip neighbourhood with a lot of restaurants, bars and coffeeshops nearby, as well as close to public transport. We absolutely enjoyed our stay in Gabriele's apartment and would definitely recommend it!

We had a great stay at Gabriele's apartment - it is a good space for 1 or 2 people. It was just as described and the photos are accurate. Gabriele also left us some tea, bottled water, beer and coffee - a lovely touch. Excellent location too - turn left out of the block and after a 5-10 minute walk you are in the midst of restaurants/bars/cafes and shops - of Old Palermo. It is also convenient for the Subte station (Palermo) to get you into central BA. It was extremely hot during our stay - so lovely to have access to the pool. However the gym was a bit disappointing - the A/C didn't seem to be working and neither was the treadmill. This was minor - overall the accommodation was excellent, Gabriele a great host and we wouldn't hesitate to recommend the apartment to friends visiting BA. All perfect!
Excelente  anfitrião... culto, com classe  e profissional. Deu-nos ótima recepção.
Gabriele was a great host. Unit was well equipped, clean and in a very convenient location. We enjoyed our stay  and would definitely stay there again. Gracias Gabrielle
